content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am very interested in renting it out for the highest price possible. What rental price are you willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to offer 500 Euros per month, but I am open to negotiation. Let's see what we can agree on.

Mister Heine, I am a student, and I am responsible and dependable. I have a good credit history and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am willing to sign a long-term lease and pay rent in advance. Is there anything else I can do to make the rental more attractive to you?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. While I appreciate the rental price, I am not entirely satisfied with it. I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment. I am open to discussing other terms that could make the rental more attractive to me.

Additionally, while I appreciate your credit history and willingness to sign a long-term lease, I am primarily interested in maximizing my rental income. I would like to discuss the possibility of renting the apartment to multiple tenants or subletting it to other students.

I would like to propose a rental price of 600 Euros per month, and I would require a security deposit of one month in advance. I hope we can come to an agreement on these terms.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your position, Mister Heine. I am willing to negotiate further on the rental price and the security deposit.

I would like to propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month, and a security deposit of one month in advance. I believe this is a fair and reasonable offer, and I am confident that we can come to an agreement on these terms.

I am also willing to consider the possibility of renting the apartment to multiple tenants or subletting it to other students. If this is something you are interested in, I am happy to discuss further how we can make it work.

I want to ensure that we both benefit from this rental agreement, and I am open to discussing any other terms or conditions that may be necessary to make that happen.

content:

I hope we can come to an agreement on these terms, and I look forward to continuing our negotiations.
